turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Don't... don't say that to me...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Son, I'm grown. Don't got patience to suffer you children and this monkey junk. I'm too old to play house...  ...and cowboys. So let's have it. End me or get out of my face!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Like a man.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Yes. I mean that's it. I wanna feel like a man with her. I wanna feel like the only man with her.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Teh... Tehronne?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Tehronne? Tehronne done this?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Nn-nn... Nn-nn... no... N'RONNIE!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: GAL! YOU HEARIN' MY VOICE?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Mm-mm... Mm-mm...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Come on, gal...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Take it easy now. Don't rush it.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: How long... how long I been out?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You been in and out goin' on two... maybe two days.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Two days?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: After your fever broke, you'd wake up in spells... long enough to get that medicine in ya.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Where's Ronnie?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Well I don't...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Wait. He left.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I don't got any money... for fixin' me up and all.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Don't need none.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Then I better be on my way. Don't wanna put you out no more.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Think it'd be best if you stayed put while we talk.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Naw'sir... I gotta be on my way.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Best try gettin' ya wits about you 'fore you try to...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Let me say somethin' first...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Why you got me chained?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Way I see it, it's gonna take a while for you to get right.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: The fuck you been doin' to me?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I ain't laid a hand on ya but to ease yo fever... Remember like I say, I found you in the road...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Get this Goddamn thing off me!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Now, no harm's come to you... and I aim to keep it that way. Ain't gonna... gonna run a train over ya... or however you call it... see... you was runnin' wild on me... these fever dreams you was havin'... these fits. I'd be chasin' you all night.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Well I'm woke now... you can take this off.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Gal, you ain't right yet.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I'm right enough to stand on my own two feet. Now take this Goddamn chain off...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: How you let men treat ya like they do?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: These men you up under. How you let them do ya like that?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Do me? Do me like this, you mean? Like chainin' me up?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You know what I'm talkin' about.  All that mess with ya teachers and... boys in the backs of trucks.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: The hell you know about me?! You got no right to talk to me about that shit! The hell you think you are?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I've saved ya life, gal. I can do and say whatever the fuck I want.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I give ya enough chain so's you can get about the house. Get you to the kitchen. You need the bathroom, it'll reach.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: What do you want?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: We got everything we need. Plenty of food. Ya medicine still got a few good swallows in it...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: WHAT DO YOU WANT FROM ME?!  WHATEVER YOU GONNA DO TO ME, JUST DO IT! AND LET ME GO!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: God saw to it to put you in my path. And I aim to cure ya of your wickedness.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You some kind'a pervert?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: No ma'am.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Some crazy Jesus freak, gonna fuck the spirit into me...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: In my house, you watch that lip...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Look it, mister... you wanna have your way, you take it. I'll do whatever you want. But you gotta let me go. You can't do this! You can't KEEP ME HERE!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You sick. You got a sickness... we broke that fever... we gonna break that hold the devil got on ya.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: LET ME GO!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You can holla y'self hoarse. Ain't gonna bend my will.  Right or wrong, you gonna mind me.  Gonna suffer you like Jesus say, to the FAITHLESS and the PERVERSE GENERATION.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Now you get up! And you get in my house!

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Or what?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Stop it! Stop it! IT HURTS!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Whose doin' is that?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Wicked little bitch... gonna cut me...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You gonna get a lot more a'that, you keep me locked up like this!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: No, ma'am. You stop that foolishness.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Hm-mm... Hm-mm...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I said... STOP!

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I CAN'T!

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You like this? Walkin' me through this field like I's your mule?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Can't sit all day on that sofa. Need to get your legs strong.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: If I break one you gonna shoot me?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: My Daddy was one of the first mens to organize soil conservation in these parts. That's a group of farmers, you know, each season they'd rotate the crop. Know why it's best to rotate em like that?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Uh-uh.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Cuz once in a while soil need a change. Corn take up a lot of nitrate in the fertilizer. So next crop what ya do is plant ya some soy beans. That give off a lot of nitrate. Change keeps it all growin' and growin' strong.  Sting a bit?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Itches.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Means ya healin'.  So all this farmin' make me think on Matthew. Matthew 13. The parable of the sower? Man toss seed on rock, on the wayside, some fell in thorns... you know the story?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Uh-uh.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: The seed that land on good soil is for them who hear the word of God... and understand the word of God. Not enough for you to hear what I'm sayin', you gotta understand.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I know. I get it. What's Matthew doin'?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Gal... Matthew ain't doin' shit... this just a story...  Look it. I've seen it in nature, I've seen it in men. Ya got to change up your crop. Cuz that seed ain't gettin' in.  Ya gotta cut this shit out. Got no cause to be up under these fools, ruttin' on ya like you a bitch. Like you somebody's dog. No woman... who joins in union with Almighty God... or man... in the sanctity of marriage... should degrade herself... and bend to ANOTHER MAN'S WILL!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: My God, gal, don't you got no SENSE? I ain't sayin' I ain't weak? Shit. Playin' guitar in the blood-bucket jukes all ya life... a nigga learn how to sin, let me tell you!  I GOT SIN IN ME! I AIN'T GO'N LIE! BUT I GOT RESPECT! AND ALL YOU GOT IS BILE, GAL!

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Let go of me...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: GIVIN' UP THAT SWITCH LIKE A TRAMP! BEHIND MY BACK AND KILL MY BABY...!

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Now that's sharp. That is sharp. Chain give you any trouble?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Uh-uh.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Good. Now I got the steaks on, potatoes at a boil, and biscuits ready to pop in the oven. R.L. and Lincoln out yonder grillin' up the corn. What do you know how to make?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I don't fuckin' cook.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Gal, I been around hard-cursin' folk all my life. And let me tell you...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Look it... I put the Goddamn dress on, didn't I? I think I'm handlin' myself with some... fuckin' restraint here... how you got me locked up like a dog on a...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: If all you got is filth comin' out'cha mouth... people just gonna tune ya out.  Rae. RAE! I'm not fightin' with ya. I just know you got more in you than junk.  Now, you sayin' you don't know how to cook anything at all?  You know how to boil water?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I can handle that.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Well, get to it.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: They sure liked them devilled eggs.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You drink whiskey?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You take it straight?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Want another?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: We drinkin' buddies now?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: To freedom.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Still makin' jokes?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: No joke.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: If you want... I can take you back to town now.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I ain't in a hurry.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Could you do somethin' for me?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Anything.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: My life is gone. Only life I was livin'. And I lost it.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I'm here with you.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I had love in my heart. And I gave it to one woman. And she gone now.  Where am I gonna put all this love?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Tell me what to do.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: The... chain helps.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I seen a man die. He couldn't breathe... his heart was... was givin' out.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You just havin' a fit. You ain't goin' nowhere.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: He told me... get help. I just stood there and watched him... I watched him die, Laz. Oh God! GODDAMMIT!

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Oh, Laz... he hurt me. He... hurt me so many times.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: No one's gonna hurt you no more.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You think God forgives people like that?  You think God forgives people like me?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Where you gonna be?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Right here. Be here all afternoon.  You ready for this?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I'm gonna just get some girl stuff, like make-up and... stuff.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You took care of your wife, like you do me?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I tried.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: What is it?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Nothin'.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Get'chu at that table up yonder.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: By myself?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You can handle it.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Are you drunk?  Keep drinkin' water and you won't get a headache in the mornin'.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Yeah, gal I been here before.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I guess you have.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Laz? Can I sleep with you tonight?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Don't think that'd be wise.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I didn't mean it nothin' dirty.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I know you didn't. But you a grown girl. You can handle it. I got to.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Sorry.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Looks like you know a song.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Don't know where I learn't it, but... it's there in my head.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: How you feelin' today?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You know how you feel when you come out of a bad hangover? Like your eyes can open a little bit more.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I know that.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Woke up real early. Sun was shining. Just thought I'd mess around, try to learn a song.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Go'on and sing it, I'll play.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: No, you do it. I can't sing.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Stop that foolishness. Just do as I say and close your eyes.  Close your eyes. And think about... well, for a song like this, I'd say you think about what you love.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: What I love.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Get a good picture in your mind.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Now that's sharp. That's real sharp. Miss Ella Mae set you up, didn't she? You like it?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I've had nice things before but I always ruined 'em somehow.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Well, this one's yours now. You ready to take care of it?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I don't want you to let go.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Maybe I won't.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Do you call it a game when only one man win each time? I think you call it a damn shame.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Word wit'cha. In private.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: You need some weed?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Been years since I fooled with that.  You know a white girl? Dirty blond hair, split down the middle like?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: That ain't up to me to hook you up. Naw what I mean? She her own, you know?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Huh?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: I don't pimp that.  You talkin' about who I think you talkin' about, you mean Rae. Rae Doole. Sexy little split tail, like you say. I can't hook you up with that. I got two girls. One ain't in town, the other one pregnant. So... you on your own.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: This Rae... you get with her?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Shit. Who hasn't?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Why you say that?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: She got a spare minute she'll snatch up anyone... but me, I'm different. Sometimes she need the real deal, so she call me up. Girl got an itch. You know... what's a nigga to do?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: She like it rough? You like beatin' on her?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: That ain't my scene. If that's somethin' you into...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Now, hold up.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: See, that girl is in my favor. You heard me, nigga? You fuck with her rough, and you got me to fuck wit.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You collar that dog, boy. I ain't gonna hurt nobody. Just wanted to know who she was.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Like I say, you wanna hook that up... I ain't in ya way. That switch of hers been all over this town. Got that sickness, you know.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: What'chu sayin'?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: She a freak. Got what you call a sexual addiction.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: What'chu sayin'?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: What I'm tellin' you. Girl gotta get dick or she go crazy.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: She a freak. Got what you call a sexual addiction.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: What'chu sayin'?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: What I'm tellin' you. Girl gotta get dick or she go crazy.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: First hooked up with that bitch when she was 16. Girl was fuckin' the principal and two of her teachers. You know coach Reynolds?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Uh-huh.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: He tapped that.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Naw!

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Go ask him.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: You ever seen a train run on a woman?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Nuh-uh.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Meanin' like a team of fellas go to work on her and she don't even break a sweat.  She into football, you know. You got a letter on your jacket you get that pussy in ya lap. I ain't playin'.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: How a girl get like that?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Like I told you.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: It got some miles on it, but my boys say she run good. Got fresh 22's on her. Ain't my doin'. That's just how it came to me. Don't worry. Nobody gonna come lookin' for it. I got the pinks... got no problem.  Ain't gonna have my girl ridin' no bus.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Don't see generosity much these days. Everything always got a catch. Guess I'm tryin' to say... thank you.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Nobody ever asks me to do shit like this for people. And you know what? I'm good at it. Naw what I mean?

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: You ain't gonna make a fuss, are you?  Nothing a man can do when a woman make up her mind.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I never laid a hand on her in anger. Not a day. Not even when I's drinkin'. But this business got me wonderin' what a good shake and slap would do for her.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: That kind of talk is between us. Don't you go in there with that shit on your tongue.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I didn't start this, R.L.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Bojo called. Said you got to see your brother at the long end of a broken bottle.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You gonna preach 'bout turnin' the other cheek?

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: I think you did alright by God under the circumstances.  Your people are here for you, Laz. This is your home. No shame in showing your face.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Don't know if God wanna see me.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: He knows where ya at. Just answer the door if he come knockin'.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Was that Lincoln James I seen run off?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: He's fine. Just had a bad fall.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Why's his britches round his knees?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: R.L., you gonna have to get on. I can't have nobody round my place.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: You get a call from Rose?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: This ain't got nothin' to do with that woman. Just don't want nobody around me now.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Somethin' wrong with ya phone? Been callin' the last few days.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Goin' dove huntin'?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You gotta go, R.L.. I ain't foolin' this time.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: You sayin' that gun's for me if I don't?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You ain't gonna talk me outta shit no more. I got my mind made up and I ain't gonna be moved on this.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Ain't gonna be moved?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Got no place for preachin' here. Not now. So you do as I say...

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Or what?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I told you to TURN BACK!

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Are you outta ya GODDAMN MIND?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Man like you ought not take the Lord's name like you just done.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: A naked woman, chained in ya house?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I'm tellin' you the truth, dammit. I found her beat. Left for dead. So I brung her home.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Laz, I know about that girl.  Good number of this town's sinners got my ear, you know.  Oh, Laz. She's had a mess of crabs and them STD's. What'chu thinking?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I haven't laid a hand. On my life, R.L., my wick is dry on this.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: You say she was beat on. You call the sheriff on that?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Put yo'self in my shoes. Say you out here, alone, with a beaten, half naked, white woman loves to fuck. I been toe to toe with the law in this town for no more than being black and nearby.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: What's that chain around her for?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Why don't you go'on and ask her. She need to talk wit somebody with sense. Folks been ruttin' and beatin' on this gal all her days. And this is how I'm handling it.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: THIS IS HOW YOU HANDLING IT? THIS IS HOW YOU HANDLING IT?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Good. Makin' steaks for supper. I expect you to come.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: You mean with you and that woman chained to ya radiator?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You treat folks special when they company. It's just supper, R.L., shit.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: One thing at a time, Laz.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Pass them potatoes, Lincoln.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Y'all let me know if these steaks are too dry.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: This all looks wonderful.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Mm. MM. Now these eggs got some kick to it. What'chu got in this?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Ask the chef.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Gotta get that chain off her, Laz. Somethin' like this gets out, you could land in a heap of trouble.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I'm dealin' with what God put before me.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: You believe He wants this? A woman chained to ya radiator?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Not like that.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Then what?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: She's tied to me, R.L.. We tied to each other.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: The hell is this shit?

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: What? I called Bojo, like you say. Called up the fellas in the band...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: The fuck are all these people doin' here? Been drinkin' in this shit hole for years ain't seen this many people since I don't know...

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: There you go, preacher man. Get me drunk so I don't stick my foot up yo ass.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: I just know how you get. Good to know, them butterflies still in ya gut.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Heard about this morning.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: We ain't here to talk about that shit.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Yeah, you know you home, old man. You just walked through the door.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I don't know, but I been told, them Georgia women sweet jelly roll.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: And now these three remain: faith, hope and love. But the greatest of these is love.  Who gives this girl in marriage?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: I do.

turns.speaker: LINCOLN
turns.text: You won't at the square this mornin'.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Get me ten bags of mulch.

turns.speaker: LINCOLN
turns.text: Yes'sir.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Keep the change on that.

turns.speaker: LINCOLN
turns.text: Naw... I got it, Mr. Lazarus.  You wanna tip me, best do it in butter beans. Momma say she need a bag 'a yours, none of that store-bought junk. That's what she said.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: What happened in there... that won't your fault. Ain't a young man alive could keep they britches on with that girl being in heat like she is.

turns.speaker: LINCOLN
turns.text: Why she got a chain on her?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: That's between her and me. It's private. And I don't want you goin' off and tellin' ya daddy.

turns.speaker: LINCOLN
turns.text: Please don't tell my daddy.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: My mouth is shut, boy. And that's how we gonna keep it. Don't go braggin' to ya buddies, ya heard me?

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: So...  That your first time?

turns.speaker: LINCOLN
turns.text: Yes'sir.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: You struck some gold, didn't ya?

turns.speaker: LINCOLN
turns.text: I skipped lunch.

turns.speaker: LAZARUS
turns.text: Well, dig in, son. Got plenty to eat.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: I gotta ask you. Why do you think Laz is keepin' you chained like this?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You know how, like they say, you save someone's life, you responsible for them. Guess he just don't think it's safe for me.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: So he got it into his head that the only thing gonna keep you from endin' up bleedin' on the side of the road again, without a stitch of clothing on is...  You think he's crazy for thinkin' that?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You a preacher?

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Can I ask you a question?  People always say, you gotta get good with Jesus, if you want not to go to hell. That you say sorry for all you done and... and Jesus would let you go on to heaven.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: You could put it that way.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: But that's so fuckin' stupid.  I'm sorry. Didn't mean to curse.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: What's on your mind?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You can't hurt people... and then just say, I'm sorry, and then everything just gets washed away. Why would heaven want people like that. People who... do what they want and then... switch.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: I'm gonna tell you somethin', and it's just gonna be between you and me.  I think folks carry on about heaven too much. Like it's some all-you-can- eat buffet up in the clouds. And folks just gonna do as they're told so they can eat what they want behind some pearly gates. I can go to Shoney's for that.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: It starts like this... fire... that spreads. Starts in my head. Then moves to my stomach. Then it goes lower. I can stop it sometimes but mostly I just jump on and ride it out... then everything'll go back to normal, you know. Only thing ever took that feeling away was... was... when I met Ronnie.  Cuz I love him so much. He's all I got in my life that's special. And I like taking care of him and helping him when he gets nervous. When I can do that for him... it's like I'm givin' somethin' of myself that I haven't givin' nobody else.

turns.speaker: R.L.
turns.text: Rae, look at Ronnie. And tell him how you feel.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: This ain't gonna work.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Rae...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I don't see why we gotta lie 'bout it when you and I know this ain't gonna work.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Rae don't do this now...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: It's stupid... It's so fucking stupid!

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Rae!

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Hey.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Hey.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You don't gotta get up but... I gotta go...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I think if I just piss... I'll be okay.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: You feelin' sick?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I'm just in one of my moods. You know how I get.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Yeah, I know.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I think it'd be better if you talk to me.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Yeah?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Just about anything, you know. It can be funny or... not. Just tell me somethin'.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Well. That's my vomit. I came in here to get sick. I thought I'd make the toilet but... anyway, I got sick.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Are you wasted?

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: No. I just got a messed up stomach.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Holy shit!

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Holy shit, Ronnie!  You're a fuckin' rock star.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: I'm a what?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: All them people shoutin' your name like they were doing tonight! Shit! That arm you got'll get'chu on a box of cereal...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I feel better. Do you?

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Yeah, I do.

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Ain't been a week and you already some nigger's whore? Gill told me. Told me how you and he... you and everybody...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Ronnie. Please, baby...

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Did 'ya have fun with her? Sweet as a peach, I bet. Huh? Huh?

turns.speaker: RONNIE
turns.text: Goddamn it, I ask you a question, you better answer it, or I'm gonna blast a hole in ya!

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Ronnie...

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Didn't know you was workin' here now?

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: I just like dressin' up in these goddamn blue vests.  Your money ticket get shipped today?

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: What happened to your face?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Got in a little accident.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Since you workin' on the square now, maybe we could get some coffee in the morning, if you want.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: You need money again?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: No. That's not why...  Why we always gotta do this? I mean, you and me been at each other as far back as I can remember. Wasn't no love between us. And I'm your daughter. I'm the only family you got.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: You never needed nobody. Always made that clear to me.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Yeah. I know I did. But...  I'm tryin' to be dif'rent. I'm tryin' to... get some peace, you know?

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: I'm workin' here, Rae. Can you see that?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I just wanted some make-up.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: All that shit's on aisle 5.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I just think you should'a kept him off me, that's all.

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: The hell are you talkin' about?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Now see? Don't do that. I'll go along with all you say about me. But that... you can't pretend no more on that. Cuz I was just a kid, Momma.  I didn't know about any of that stuff he was doin' to me.  And you let him do it. Some big nobody in your life... and you let him do as he wanted... with the only SOMEBODY you had.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I'm sorry... I didn't mean to shout...

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: All my life I been puttin' out your fires, with you givin' out your snatch to every waggin' dick in this town. And you gonna lay the blame at my feet? Well, I ain't gonna take that.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: But... Momma... just tell me... not gonna be mad... we can just talk about it... Be eye to eye on this... You don't even got to say you're sorry... Just say how you knew...

turns.speaker: SANDY
turns.text: Only thing I'm sorry for is listenin' to my parents and having you instead of doin' what I should'a done.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: You got any money?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Thought you had a man for that.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: I said we wasn't gonna talk about him.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: What we just did, you askin' for money, make a man stop. I ain't callin' you no ho. But I ain't gonna be played like no trick, neither. Remember... you called me.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Save that hustle talk to them field ballers you sell crack to.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: What'd I tell you?  I don't do none of that shit no more. I'm in communications now.

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Stolen phone cards and two-ways is what you sayin'.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Mobile technology is the new fix for these niggaz, I'm tellin' you. I'm just lookin' ahead.  Anyways, ain't no money in drugs no more with these rednecks popping cough pills like they's Skittles. Hey, that's what you need, girl. Get you some cough medicine. What, you sick?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: Just a cough. Sugar and a spoonful of Jack'll do it.

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Alright. How much you need, ho?

turns.speaker: RAE
turns.text: The hell you call me?

turns.speaker: TEHRONNE
turns.text: Eh, if the bootie fits...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I think she got to you, pappy.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: You want a popsicle, go to Good Humor.  And don't call me 'pappy.'

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Still, you gotta wonder how she'd look in handcuffs.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: ... It's not like you were slow or anything... I think you did just fine.  I think you did great.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Hey, hey, where you goin'?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Home.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Wait up.  You know the guy who did the Weismuller through the window --

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: -- Cavello.  Ronnie Cavello.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: He works for Frank Abolofia. Atlantic City.  Casinos.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: So why dive through the glass for a nickel and dime bust?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: What's this?

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Let go...

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Back-up.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Get rid of it.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Why?

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: It's not regulation.  And the only way you're gonna stop anybody with it is to show it to him, and while he's laughing, you can shove it down his throat.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: I'll get rid of it when you get rid of the egg-beater.

turns.speaker: CHARLIE
turns.text: Nick, let's go hunting.  Bag Cavello.

turns.speaker: NICK
turns.text: Charlie...
